mapper.select: select f.*, l.p_price, l.p_rdate, l.p_rating, l.p_listimg, l.p_count from product_info f, product_list l where f.p_num = l.p_num and f.p_num = #{param1}

SELECT p_num, p_name, p_price, p_rating, p_listimg FROM ( SELECT p_num, p_name, p_price, p_listimg, p_rating, p_scount, AVG(p_rating) OVER () AS avg_rating, AVG(p_scount) OVER () AS avg_scount FROM product_list WHERE p_scount != 0 AND p_rating != 0 ) WHERE p_rating >= (SELECT AVG(p_rating) FROM product_list) AND p_scount >= (SELECT AVG(p_scount) FROM product_list) AND ROWNUM <= 3 ORDER BY (p_rating + p_scount) DESC
SELECT * FROM a_board WHERE rownum <= 3 ORDER BY a_like
SELECT DISTINCT u_id FROM p_bascket WHERE u_id = #{param1}
